porCuestiones: For security reasons, you can only request <1>3 codes</1> before having to contact support.
cadaCodigo: Each code is valid for 45 minutes. We recommend <2>waiting at least 30 minutes</2> before requesting another code as this will invalidate the last requested code.
Se ha enviado el correo con el link para: An email has been sent with instructions to reset your password. Remember it can take up to 30 minutes to arrive.

Te enviaremos una liga especial al corre.Tienes 30 minutos para hacer click en e: We will send you a special link in an email. You have 30 minutes to click the link.

Revisa tu correo registrado y haz click: Check your email and click the link we will send you in order to confirm your email address.
signUpParagraph: Hello!<1></1>You're one step away from joining La Brújula. Create your user, add your information, and connect with other industry members.<3></3><4></4>We want you to be a part of La Brújula.
Haz click aquí para regresar a tu perfil: Click here to return to your profile

Escribe aquí a que asociaciones de la in: List the associations inside the industry you belong to
